segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, cascading onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a large puddle, and the woman doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad seeing the water go to waste like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are so focused on the cookies, they don't care about the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching his limits, trying to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and get hurt, that would be terrible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is eagerly waiting, her hand outstretched for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should really turn off the faucet and pay attention to what's going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so serene, it's a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone will notice the water before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
